tasks.title: Create table
tasks.code: CREATE TABLE users(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, age INTEGER);

tasks.title: Select rows
tasks.code: SELECT id, name, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;

tasks.title: Update rows
tasks.code: UPDATE users SET age = age + 1 WHERE name = 'Ada';

tasks.title: Inner join
tasks.code: SELECT u.name, o.total FROM users u JOIN orders o ON o.user_id = u.id;

tasks.title: Group & aggregate
tasks.code: SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS cnt, SUM(total) AS sum_total FROM orders GROUP BY user_id;

tasks.title: Explain query
tasks.code: EXPLAIN QUERY PLAN SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = 'Ada';

steps.title: DDL + seed
Queries
steps.code:
SELECT u.name, COUNT(o.id) AS orders, ROUND(SUM(o.total),2) AS revenue
FROM users u LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.user_id = u.id
GROUP BY u.id
ORDER BY revenue DESC;

tips.title: NULLs
tips.note: Use IS NULL / IS NOT NULL; equality comparisons with NULL return unknown.
